name: Southern Baked Chicken

ingredients.name: Southern Baked Gluten Free Crumb Mix

preparation: Meanwhile, cut chicken into pieces. Coat chicken with oil. Place crumb mix in a resealable plastic bag.
Add one piece of chicken at a time, shaking gently until evenly coated. Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Bake in preheated oven for 15–17 min or until cooked through.
tips: For extra flavor, coat chicken pieces with your favorite prepared Epicure dip, then coat with crumb mixture.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup mashed potatoes and 1 1⁄2 cups mixed greens or coleslaw with 2 tbsp Epicure salad dressing, your choice.

products.name: Southern Baked Gluten Free Crumb Mix (Pack of 3)
